page.title: 10NEW SCANNING SYSTEM.(TRADE)
page.content: In our area Sainsburys is the largest supermarket store.It has been brought up to date with the latest system for checking out their stock. Instead of the cashier ringing up the price of the articles as they are brought to the checkout,the cashier now passes the item over a scanner which will read the bar codes that are now printed on the products.When a bar code label is passed over the window in the checkout ,the scanner passes on a message to the computer asking for the description and price.This information is then sent back to the cash register and shows up on a special display panel and printed on the customers receipt. This system should improve the service offered at the checkout by speeding up the checkout operation and reduce queues at busy times.
